name: Holiday Inn Southampton - Eastleigh M3,jct13

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Platinum membership - although the staff seemed aware they are supposed to upgrade you, when I checked in nothing was said regarding my platinum membership and I had to ask if I get anything for my status. With that I was abruptly told that the hotel was full and there would be no upgrades available. This was irritating as I had checked availabilty the previous day and there was plenty of space, but I then re-checked and discovered they were in fact telling the truth. No drinks vouchers or wine in the room was received as I often do in other hotels in this chain.
reviews.title: Very Functional

description: The Holiday Inn Southampton-Eastleigh is located between Southampton and Winchester in the heart of Hampshire, with easy access to the M3 and M27 and ample complimentary car parking. The hotel is conveniently located in close proximity to Southampton International Airport and Cruise Terminals. If you would like to take the family on day trips to the New Forest, Beaulieu Motor Museum, Marwell Zoo and Paulton's Family Leisure Park, then this Eastleigh hotel is the ideal location for you. This modern, extensively refurbished Southampton hotel features 129 fully air-conditioned bedrooms, including disabled access rooms and family rooms. Enjoy the contemporary cuisine in the Junction Restaurant or dine in your room with our 24 hour Room Service. Best of all, Kids Stay & Eat Free. Spend time working out and relaxing in the Spirit Health Club with the fully equipped gym, indoor swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna and beauty treatment facilities. The Holiday Inn Southampton-Eastleigh offers both Airport and Cruise Park, Stay & Go packages.
